cvrfdoc.DocumentTitle: FortiClient (Windows) - Denial of service due to folder access permission change

DocumentPublisher.ContactDetails: Fortinet PSIRT Contact: Email: vulnwatch@fortinet.com Website: fortiguard.com/psirt-pgpkey

DocumentNotes.Note: An improper control of a resource through its lifetime [CWE-664] vulnerability in FortiClient (Windows) may allow a privileged attacker to make the whole application unresponsive via changing its root directory access permission.
FortiClient (Windows) version 6.0.10 and below FortiClient (Windows) version 6.2.9 and below FortiClient (Windows) version 6.4.1 and 6.4.0
Upgrade to FortiClient (Windows) version 6.4.2 or above. Upgrade to FortiClient (Windows) version 7.0.0 or above.
Fortinet is pleased to thank Mike de Almeida for reporting this vulnerability under responsible disclosure
